object.name: getChatMember
object.description: Use this method to get information about a member of a chat. The method is only guaranteed to work for other users if the bot is an administrator in the chat. Returns a ChatMember object on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to get information about a member of a chat. The method is only guaranteed to work for other users if the bot is an administrator in the chat. Returns a ChatMember object on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to get information about a member of a chat. The method is only guaranteed to work for other users if the bot is an administrator in the chat. Returns a :class:`aiogram.types.chat_member.ChatMember` object on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup or channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup or channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup or channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.name: user_id
